§ 8780. Heat and light for Young Men’s Christian Association buildings The Secretary of the Navy may furnish, without charge, heat and light to any building of the Young Men’s Christian Association located at a naval activity. (Aug. 10, 1956, ch. 1041, 70A Stat. 470, § 7580; renumbered § 8780, Pub. L. 115–232, div. A, title VIII, § 807(d)(9), Aug. 13, 2018, 132 Stat. 1837.)
